page.title: 12GAMES CONTINUED
page.content: "pirates","conkers","marbles","skipping ",etc.Grown ups play some games as well as children. Indoor games that we play are "monopoly",when you try to get as much money as you can by buying hotels and houses,"Breakout",when you have to find the way out of a maze using a dice to move.Most people play games with playing cards - rummy,snap,draw the well dry,pontoon,patience and whist.A lot of the indoor games are played by the whole family.Scrabble is a good game - you have to make words with lots of little plastic tiles,you score points for each letter in the word.Most indoor games are bought from shops often as presents at Christmas or birthdays.
